alert.note: Alert for Austin; Inland Harris; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Austin, central Waller and west central Harris Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Island, or near Hempstead, moving east at 25 to 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hockley, Waller, Pine Island and Monaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.
